content.description: The writer wants to add information to the end of sentence 11 (reproduced below), adjusting the punctuation as needed, to explain why scientists may benefit from using sonification to share their research.
content.question: NASA has translated data from several of its space endeavors into sound, and a 2020 study concluded that sonification can also help scientists share their results with nonexperts.Which of the following choices, if added to the end of sentence 11, best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: an end that can even be achieved with complex orchestral compositions that rely on musical conventions
even though experimental studies have not proved the theory that some people rely more on touch, sound, or sight to process information
who sometimes grasp scientific concepts more easily if they are presented with supplementary graphics as well
who may not have the mathematical skills to understand the often-complex graphical representations used to communicate research findings

content.answer: who may not have the mathematical skills to understand the often-complex graphical representations used to communicate research findings
